item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello World! I finnaly decided to setup my personal website where I can share stuff about programming and development! print("Hello World!") This is the first time I used HUGO for any kind of application, so far I’m linking it a lot. Hopefully, I can keep the site simple and lightweight :) Later down the line, there will be tutorials, and content targeted to people who want to learn programming or deep diver into specific topics.
item.content:
Hello World!

I finnaly decided to setup my personal website where I can share stuff about programming and development!

print("Hello World!")

This is the first time I used HUGO for any kind of application, so far I’m linking it a lot. Hopefully, I can keep the site simple and lightweight :)

Later down the line, there will be tutorials, and content targeted to people who want to learn programming or deep diver into specific topics.
